topicTitle: Huh, just noticed this... Intro time.

posts.postText:
Moving along, a few of you already know me, but those that don't, I generally suck at most any fps. That being said, I love to map and found myself enjoying puzzle gamemode enough to dedicate a good portion of my free time donating maps to it. Granted I have a very odd work schedule coupled with being a volunteer firefighter, so my schedule is very random, but at the very least, i'd like to shell out one map a week provided y''all dont get initimidated/enraged at the map rotation being dominated by my name. <---(Intimidation/Enragement was a joke) :O!

Oh, I like making faces at the end of my sentences in a normal conversation, and if this offends you, please cover your eyes... it's gonna get gruesome here on out. :D
Oh god that smiley made me blind.
hey, i envy your map making skills, welcome to the forums :D

I like your maps, good, and difficult(for me). Welcome!

(Your avatar kinda scares me)

>> >>  (Your avatar kinda scares me)  
And if I were to say I thought my avatar looked cute? :O!
 
That aside, I'm glad you enjoy my maps, and I hope to keep churning out more and more ya'll could enjoy. This being said, I generally suck at the hard stuff myself in that gamemode XD (ie, "trickery_adv_b4"s "pinpoint")

I'm pretty sure his avatar is a reference to emoticons and their side-ways-ness
(:
